(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (NP (RB Everytime))))


root(ROOT-0, Everytime-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP think)
      (PP (IN about)
        (NP (NNP Chicken) (NNPS Pies))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(think-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, think-2)
prep(think-2, about-3)
nn(Pies-5, Chicken-4)
pobj(about-3, Pies-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (VP (VBN reminded)
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NNS ones))
            (SBAR
              (S
                (NP (PRP they))
                (VP (VBD used)
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB sell)
                        (PP (IN in)
                          (NP
                            (NP (DT the) (NN neighborhood) (NNS bakeries))
                            (PP (IN in)
                              (NP (DT the) (NNS seventies)
                                (CC and)
                                (NNS eighties)))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubjpass(reminded-3, I-1)
auxpass(reminded-3, am-2)
root(ROOT-0, reminded-3)
prep(reminded-3, of-4)
det(ones-6, the-5)
pobj(of-4, ones-6)
nsubj(used-8, they-7)
rcmod(ones-6, used-8)
aux(sell-10, to-9)
xcomp(used-8, sell-10)
prep(sell-10, in-11)
det(bakeries-14, the-12)
nn(bakeries-14, neighborhood-13)
pobj(in-11, bakeries-14)
prep(bakeries-14, in-15)
det(seventies-17, the-16)
pobj(in-15, seventies-17)
cc(seventies-17, and-18)
conj(seventies-17, eighties-19)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (VP (VBP know))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(know-2, You-1)
root(ROOT-0, know-2)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (NNS ones))
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WDT that))
        (S
          (VP (VBD were)
            (VP (VBN shaped)
              (PP (IN like)
                (NP (JJ big) (NNS muffins)))
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP (DT a) (NN dome))))))))
    (VP
      (VP (VBN shaped)
        (NP (NN top)))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBN made)
        (PP (IN with)
          (NP (NN puff) (NN pastry)))))
    (. .)))


det(ones-2, the-1)
nsubj(shaped-12, ones-2)
nsubjpass(shaped-5, that-3)
auxpass(shaped-5, were-4)
rcmod(ones-2, shaped-5)
prep(shaped-5, like-6)
amod(muffins-8, big-7)
pobj(like-6, muffins-8)
prep(shaped-5, with-9)
det(dome-11, a-10)
pobj(with-9, dome-11)
root(ROOT-0, shaped-12)
dobj(shaped-12, top-13)
cc(shaped-12, and-14)
conj(shaped-12, made-15)
prep(made-15, with-16)
nn(pastry-18, puff-17)
pobj(with-16, pastry-18)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Man))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Man-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP they))
    (VP (VBD were)
      (ADJP (JJ good)))
    (. .)))


nsubj(good-3, they-1)
cop(good-3, were-2)
root(ROOT-0, good-3)


(ROOT
  (FRAG (CC But)
    (RB then)
    (SBAR
      (ADVP (RB again))
      (IN as)
      (S
        (NP (PRP I))
        (VP (VBP have)
          (VP (VBN said)
            (PP (IN before))
            (, ,)))))))


cc(then-2, But-1)
root(ROOT-0, then-2)
advmod(said-7, again-3)
mark(said-7, as-4)
nsubj(said-7, I-5)
aux(said-7, have-6)
dep(then-2, said-7)
prep(said-7, before-8)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NN nostalgia))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB perhaps))
      (NP
        (NP (CD one))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (DT the) (JJS best) (NN taste) (NNS enhancers)))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(one-4, nostalgia-1)
cop(one-4, is-2)
advmod(one-4, perhaps-3)
root(ROOT-0, one-4)
prep(one-4, of-5)
det(enhancers-9, the-6)
amod(enhancers-9, best-7)
nn(enhancers-9, taste-8)
pobj(of-5, enhancers-9)
